[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@microsoft/rush-lib](./rush-lib.md) &gt; [PnpmResolutionMode](./rush-lib.pnpmresolutionmode.md)

## PnpmResolutionMode type

Possible values for the `resolutionMode` setting in Rush's pnpm-config.json file.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type PnpmResolutionMode = 'highest' | 'time-based' | 'lowest-direct';
```

## Remarks

These modes correspond to PNPM's `resolution-mode` values, which are documented here: [https://pnpm.io/npmrc\#resolution-mode](https://pnpm.io/npmrc#resolution-mode)
